classes.name: EmailMessage
classes.description: Main class to create mail messages

attributes.name: smtpHost
attributes.description: Mail sender SMTP host name or IP address

attributes.name: smtpPort
attributes.description: Mail sender SMTP port (the default is 25)

attributes.name: toAddress
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of destination email addresses

attributes.name: fromAddress
attributes.description: Email address of the sender

attributes.name: fromName
attributes.description: Display name of the sender (optional)

attributes.name: ccAddress
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of Carbon copy email addresses

attributes.name: bccAddress
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of Blank Carbon copy email addresses

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Email subject

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: Username to connect to the SNMP host

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: Password to connect to the SNMP host

attributes.name: useSsl
attributes.description: Whether or not using smtp or smtps (SMTP over Ssl) protocol

attributes.name: useStartTls
attributes.description: Whether or not to enable STARTTLS command

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Send the message.

methods.name: addMimePart
methods.description: Add a mime part to the message.

methods.name: setSessionProperty
methods.description: Set a session property.

methods.name: getSessionProperty
methods.description: Get the value of the specified session property.

classes.name: MailClient
classes.description: Mail client that can be used to retrieve messages from a mail server. The default protocol is IMAP but POP3 protocol can also be used.

methods.name: enableSSL
methods.description: Enable SSL connection.

methods.name: setConnectionTimeout
methods.description: Set connection timeout.

methods.name: setSocketTimeout
methods.description: Set socket timeout.

methods.name: setProtocol
methods.description: Set a mail protocol to use.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connect the client to a mail server.
methods.parameters: host: String, port: number, username: String, password: String

methods.name: enableImapCompatibilityMode
methods.description: Enables the IMAP Compatibility mode. It allows the client to avoid all sorts of parsing and protocol bugs in many IMAP servers, but of course it comes at the cost of being less efficient because it is not taking advantage of the IMAP protocol's ability to fetch only the parts of the message that are needed. For complete reference - http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javamail/faq/index.html#imapserverbug

methods.name: disableImapCompatibilityMode
methods.description: Disables the IMAP Compatibility mode.

methods.name: getDefaultFolder
methods.description: Returns the name of the root folder of the default namespace presented to the user.

methods.name: openFolder
methods.description: Opens a folder on the mail server.

methods.name: openDefaultFolder
methods.description: Opens the root folder of the default namespace presented to the user.

methods.name: getSubFolders
methods.description: Returns a list of subfolders of the current folder.

methods.name: getSubscribedSubFolders
methods.description: Returns a list of subfolders of the current folder.

methods.name: getUserNamespaces
methods.description: Returns a set of folders representing the namespaces for a user.

methods.name: closeFolder
methods.description: Closes the current folder.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Returns a message from the mail server.

methods.name: getMessagesBetween
methods.description: Returns a list of messages from the mail server which have message numbers within a certain range.

methods.name: getMessages
methods.description: Returns all messages in the current folder.

methods.name: getUnseenMessages
methods.description: Returns all unread messages in the current folder.

methods.name: getRecentMessages
methods.description: Returns all recent messages of the current folder.

methods.name: getDeletedMessages
methods.description: Returns all deleted messages from the current folder.

methods.name: searchFromAddress
methods.description: Returns all messages that contain a specific string in the "From" address attribute.

methods.name: searchRecipientAddress
methods.description: Returns all messages that contain a specific string in the "To", "Cc" or "Bcc" address attributes.

methods.name: searchBodyMessage
methods.description: Returns all messages that contain a specific string in the message body.

methods.name: searchSubjectMessage
methods.description: Returns all messages that contain a specific string in the message subject.

methods.name: getMessageCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of messages in the current folder.

methods.name: getNewMessageSize
methods.description: Returns the number of the new messages in the current folder.

methods.name: deleteMessage
methods.description: Mark a message for deletion. Messages marked for deletion are deleted by the server only when the folder is closed or by explicitly invoking an 'expunge' method.

methods.name: deleteMessages
methods.description: Mark messages for deletion. Messages marked for deletion are deleted by the server only when the folder is closed or by explicitly invoking an 'expunge' method.

methods.name: expungeMessages
methods.description: Expunge (permanently remove) all messages marked for deletion.

methods.name: setMaxBodyPartSize
methods.description: Set MAX allowed body part size in MB

methods.name: setSessionProperty
methods.description: Set a session property.

methods.name: getSessionProperty
methods.description: Get the value of the specified session property.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Disconnects the client from the mail server. Expunges all messages marked for deletion.

classes.name: MessageBodyPart
classes.description: Part of the message that contains a set of attributes and a content

attributes.name: contentType
attributes.description: Content-Type of the content of this part. Returns null if the Content-Type could not be determined.

attributes.name: disposition
attributes.description: Disposition of this part. The disposition describes how the part should be presented to the user.

attributes.name: fileName
attributes.description: Filename associated with this part, if possible.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of this body part as a raw string.

methods.name: getMultiPartContent
methods.description: Returns the content as MessageMultiPart if the body part is of a multipart type.

methods.name: isContentMultiPart
methods.description: Shows whether the content is a multipart object.

methods.name: getSize
methods.description: Return the size of the content of this part in bytes.

methods.name: isAttachment
methods.description: Returns true if this part is an attachment.

methods.name: getAsMimeAttachment
methods.description: Returns the content as MimeAttachment object.

classes.name: MessageMultiPart
classes.description: Container that holds multiple body parts

methods.name: getPartsCount
methods.description: Returns the number of the body parts.

methods.name: getBodyPart
methods.description: Returns a specific body part from the multipart message.
